Blacknightmare:

BlackNgithmaredeeped the kiss and hugged him tight

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice:
>  
> He calmed somewhat, listening to the femme holding him close.  He 
said nothing, and when she kissed him, it was an experiance that was 
without compare.  He deepened the kiss, not wanting the moment to 
end.
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> BlackNightmare:
> 
> BlackNightmare huged him and in low voice she said in his ear"I'll 
> tell you, not here, not now... try to rest... and act as anything 
is 
> happening or we will lost"
> 
> She kissed him, with appasion. POerhaps it may be the last kiss 
that 
> she could give him
>
